introduction.title: Welcome! ðŸ‘‹
introduction.text: My name is ThÃ©o, and I am currently studying at ENSTA Paris, one of France's leading engineering schools. I am currently achieving a gap-year internship at the Laboratory of Mechanics Paris-Saclay (LMPS), working on the DREAM-ON structural health monitoring project. I've always been passionate about science and technology, and I aim to contribute to the creation of diverse and innovative projects. In my free time, I work on small projects and enjoy climbing, among other activities. Feel free to contact me for more information or just to chat!

experience.title: My experience
experience.description: Click on an item to see its details!

lmps.title: Laboratory of Mechanics Paris-Saclay (LMPS) - Paris-Saclay University
lmps.text: DREAM-ON project: structural health monitoring augmented by AI

fiuba.title: Fluid Dynamics laboratory - University of Buenos Aires (UBA), Argentina 🇦🇷

taep.title: TAEP, the Junior-Enterprise of ENSTA Paris

areas.title: Columbus CafÃ©&Co et Ibis HÃ´tels
areas.text: Multi-purpose employee at a freeway service area

portfolio.title: My projects
portfolio.description: Development and/or engineering projects, partially or totally using self-taught skills on my free time.

highest.title: Highest
highest.description: A web application that allows climbers to log their routes and track their progress, inspired by my passion for climbing.
highest.challenges: Optimization and deployment of a complete web application

bop.title: BecauseOfProg
bop.description: We are a group of IT enthusiasts brought together to create projects and share our discoveries.
bop.challenges: Writing popularization articles, developing a blog and managing projects since I'm 14

mapping.title: 3D cartography platform
mapping.description: A 3D-printed platform equipped with a LiDAR sensor for room modeling. Real-time scan transmission to a website, with options for calculations and surface reconstruction.
mapping.challenges: Component interfacing, radio communication, and 3D modeling

tipe.title: Earthquake reconnaissance drone
tipe.text: Path tracing algorithms over a urban environment
tipe.description: Trajectory planification algorithms for drones to explore zones devastated by an earthquake, taking into account topography and population density.
tipe.challenges: Applying a rigorous scientific method with multiple different algorithms and summarizing the results

vision.title: MATLAB Computer vision
vision.description: Efficient algorithm using color and shape data from the image to detect red traffic lights.
vision.challenges: Use of various color spaces, advanced research of maximum efficiency for fast, reliable results

aierolab.title: AIerolab
aierolab.text: Airfoil modeling using AI and aerodynamics experiments
aierolab.description: Simulating the flow around an airfoil using Machine Learning, and printing a 3D model to characterize its aerodynamics in a wind tunnel
aierolab.challenges: Developing a neural network for physics, rigorously conducting experiments

ipt.title: Physics tournament - Honey characterization
ipt.description: Physics experiments and analysis to characterize the oscillations of honey, in the context of the International Physicists' Tournament (IPT)
ipt.challenges: Autonomously conducting my first research methodology

lbm.title: LBM for the backward-facing step
lbm.description: Lattice-Boltzmann simulation of the backward-facing step, exploring the influence of parameters and comparing to bibliography
lbm.challenges: Coding from scratch a complex fluid mechanics simulation, rigorously analyzing the results

hickathon.title: Hi!ckathon - Hi!Paris hackathon
hickathon.description: A 48-hours Machine Learning competition to predict water shortages during summer months, by teams of 5-8 and using a large database
hickathon.challenges: Applying prior ML knowledge to a real business case, working with many people on a ML project

joyero.title: Joyero (MIT Hackathon)
joyero.description: A 17-hours competition to answer to a problem using LLMs. My choice was agentic AI to naturally and quickly prototype 3D models through a chat and generative AI
joyero.challenges: Learning how to build Agents with tool use in a reduced time, making quick iterations on LLMs

code.name: Programming
code.description: I have had a passion for computing for a long time, and I create my own applications and websites since I'm twelve (2016) to put my ideas into practice without being dependent on others or inflexible tools. Since 2018, I publish some of them on Github to share my creations and open them to everyone's contribution. I have learnt OCaml and C in preparatory class, Javascript, Python, Ruby and Go by self-taught, and I use Jetbrains IDE on Linux.

climbing.name: Climbing
climbing.description: Since joining a club in 2018, I've enjoyed climbing routes and bouldering, indoor or outdoor, to challenge myself and clear my head. I complete this practice with various sport (weight training, cardio, mountain biking) so that I'm always in shape to progress.

cubing.name: Twisty puzzles
cubing.description: I have learnt to solve the Rubik's Cube then various algorithms so I can solve it as fast as I can (Speed Cubing field), then I did the same with other puzzles. My ambition is to eventually participate at competitions, friendly exchange moments on this wide subject. From now on I solve puzzles without assistance to deeply understand their mechanism arouse my curiosity.
